name: Italian Vegan Garbanzo Bean Soup
description: This Italian vegan garbanzo bean soup is perfect for chilly fall days. It's super easy to make and packed with flavor and nutrients.
recipeIngredient: 3 stalks celery, cut into medium-sized chunks
1  fennel bulb, cut into thin slices
about  15 cherry tomatoes, cut into halves

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, heat the olive oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Then add the garlic, the carrots, the celery, and the fennel. Cook for about 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot, heat the olive oil and sauté the onion for about 3 minutes. Then add the garlic, the carrots, the celery, and the fennel. Cook for about 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in a can of diced tomatoes, the chickpeas, and three cups of vegetable broth. Cook for about 15 minutes. Then add the cherry tomatoes and the spinach and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in a can of diced tomatoes, the chickpeas, and three cups of vegetable broth. Cook for about 15 minutes. Then add the cherry tomatoes and the spinach and cook for another 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with fresh parsley, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with fresh parsley, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper.
